item.title: Anonymous types and with keyword
item.description: Daily Knowledge Drop The with keyword can be used to create a new instance of an anonymous type where one of more properties have new values. Anonymous types First off, a brief explanation of anonymous types. Anonymous types are a way to encapsulate a set of read only properties into a single object without explicitly defining a type. The type name is generated internally by the compiler and the type of each property is inferred by the compiler.
